message:
"Ode to Shrouded Dignity"

In tartan boxers and quiet defiance,
A parade - a sonnet, spun around.
War, the painter of imperfect mosaic,
Humans, the canvas, dignity bound.
In silent protest, we fashion a masterpiece,
Stripped bare yet crowned.
prompt: Footage shows IDF parading scores of Palestinian men around in underwear The International Committee of the Red Cross has said it is concerned by images of semi-naked Palestinian men being paraded by the Israeli military in Gaza, adding that all of those detained must be treated in keeping with international humanitarian law. “We strongly emphasise the importance of treating all those detained with humanity and dignity, in accordance with international humanitarian law,” Jessica Moussan, a
